nodes.text: The First Order starfighter corps, also known as the First Order TIE corps, also known as the TIE pilot corps, was a Starfighter Corps of the First Order that consisted of First Order TIE Fighter Pilots. Pilots from the corps pursued the Resistance fleet, and participated in the Battle of Crait. Several of the members, who had been surviving members of Starkiller Base's TIE defenses, were especially eager to end the Resistance in order to prove their worth after their failure to prevent Starkiller Base's destruction.

The First Order starfighter corps, also known as the First Order TIE corps or simply as the TIE pilot corps, was the Starfighter Corps of the First Order. The Corps consisted of First Order TIE Fighter Pilots and participated in a number of battles during the First Order/Resistance War. The First Order starfighter corps had an organizational military structure that included squadrons and fighter battalions.
